name: Sany? Pachinko Paradise 5: Ukiuki Tairy?ki
description: Pachinko Paradise 5 is one of the many titles in Irem's long-running pachinko simulation series. It features reproductions of three pachinko machines made by Sanyo Bussan: CR Ukiuki Fishing M3, CR Ukiuki Fishing L5, CR Ukiuki Fishing L7. There are two modes available: Ts?j? (Normal) mode allows the player to modify a wide range of settings for each machine, while Jissen (Battle) mode challenges the player to win as many balls as possible on the default settings with a limited starting pool and time limit. There is also a View mode where the various animations that play on the in-game display can be freely viewed. There is no story mode.
